acute_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Acute
acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 1 from 96 hours LC50=0.1mg/L of the fish (Oryzias Latipes) (Environmental Agency eco-toxicity tests of chemicals (1999)).

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.hazard_name: Acute toxicity Inhalation: Dusts and mists
acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

acute_toxicity_inhalation_gas.rationale: Since it was a solid by the definition of GHS and inhalation in gas was not assumed, it was classified into "Not applicable".

acute_toxicity_inhalation_vapor.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

aspiration_hazard.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

carcinogenicity.rationale: Since no evaluation by major international evaluation agencies is made and there is no data, classification is not possible. In addition, 1,2-Dimethylhydrazine which is an analogue is classified in group 2A by IARC (IARC 71 (1999)).

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Long-term
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_statement: Very toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Since acute toxicity was Category 1 and there were no rapid degradability (not readily degradable, the decomposition by BOD: 0%(Existing Chemical Safety Inspections Data (1987))), it was classified into Category 1.

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available.

explosives.rationale: Although the N-N group is included in chemical structure and the calculation value of oxygen balance is -183, classification is not possible with no data of onset of exothermic decomposition and decomposition energy.

flammable_gases.hazard_name: Flammable gases including chemically unstable gases

flammable_solids.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

organic_peroxides.rationale: The organic compound not including peroxy group in molecule.

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Although it is an organic compound including chlorine, not fluorine and oxygen, this chlorine has not chemically bound to any elements other than carbon and hydrogen.

pyrophoric_solids.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

reproductive_toxicity.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

respiratory_sensitizer.rationale: Classification is not possible since there is no data.

self_heating_substances.rationale: The test method applicable for substances becoming liquid or gas at 140degC of test temperature has not been established.

self_reactive_substances.rationale: Although the N-N group is included in chemical structure, classification is not possible with no data.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: Although there is a description of " All Hydrazine show a similar local effect by its stimulative aspect and the vapor is highly irritating for an eye." in the clause of the human healthy influence of HSDB (2004), since there is no data as this substance, classification is not possible. In addition, [ID 56] Hydrazine (CAS302-01-2) is classified into Category 1, and [ID 245] Methylhydrazine (CAS60-34-4) and [ID 907] Phenyl hydrazine (CAS100-63-0) are classified into Category 2A.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: Although there is a description, " All Hydrazine show similar local effects depending on irritation conditions and its vapor is highly irritating to the skin", in the section for Effects on Human Health of HSDB (2004), classification is not possible because there is no data for this substance. Incidentally, [JD56] Hydrazine (CAS302-01-2) has been classified in Category 1A-1C and [ID245] Methylhydrazine (CAS60-34-4) and Phenylhydrazine (CAS100-63-0) in Category 2.

skin_sensitizer.rationale: Classification is not possible since there is no data.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: Metals or metalloids (B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At) are not included.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data
